package.name: Net_URL2
package.summary: Class for parsing and handling URL.
package.description: Provides parsing of URLs into their constituent parts (scheme, host, path etc.), URL generation, and resolving of relative URLs.
package.notes: * BC break: Removed setOption() to avoid undefined behaviour (bug #16674) * Fixed Bug #16854: Invalid package.xml making it impossible to install with Pyrus * Fixed Bug #16651: Port may be an empty string * Fixed Bug #16653: Don't make OPTION_SEPARATOR_(IN|OUT)PUT default to arg_separator.(in|out)put

release.notes: * Fixed #14399 (Errors in URL parsing (items #1 and #3)) * Fixed #14735 (Encode query string values) * Fixed #15546 (Add adding __toString()) * Fixed #15367 (Use RFC 3986-compliant version of rawurlencode() in PHP < 5.2) * Fixed #14289 (Add __get() and __set())

Major rewrite to comply with RFC3986 (bug 11574). Much better support for resolving relative URLs. WARNING: Method and property names has changed to reflect the terminology used in the RFC - THIS RELEASE IS NOT BACKWARDS COMPATIBLE WITH VERSION 0.1.0.
Convert to PHP5 only. PHP4 users should continue with version 1.0.15
